alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GARDEN AND SOUTHWESTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Antioch, or 17 miles southeast of Alliance, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Antioch, Patterson Lake, Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Snow Lake, Richardson Lake, Miles Lake, Mumper, Wickson Lake, Diamond Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake, Krause Lake, and Tralnor Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 26. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
